patch.comment: Update repository URL

minor.comment: Upgrade @types/node dependency
Introduce an optional build timeout.

patch.comment: Security updates.

minor.comment: Update gulp to 4.0.2

patch.comment: Remove karma task.

minor.comment: Upgrade Jest to version 23.

patch.comment: Remove unused jju dependency
Remove all dependencies on the "rimraf" library
Replace deprecated dependency gulp-util
Remove use of a deprecated Buffer API.
Update documentation
Update "repository" field in package.json
Fix an issue where the Jest task uses the global temp directory.
Update to use new node-core-library API
Republish all packages in web-build-tools to resolve GitHub issue #782
Add explicit dependency on jsdom to workaround Jest regression #6766

minor.comment: Add support for modulePathIgnorePatterns for the Jest task

patch.comment: Upgrade to Jest 22.4.3 and remove the workaround for the symlink bug
Fix an issue where snapshot filenames did not follow Jest's naming convention.
Upgrade colors to version ~1.2.1

minor.comment: Add a `libESNextFolder` option

patch.comment: Fix the "relogIssues" buld config option.

minor.comment: made default testMatch and maxWorkers arguments in Jest task overridable

patch.comment: Force a patch bump in case the previous version was an empty package
Replace gulp-util.colors with colors package

minor.comment: Add a feature where when shouldWarningsFailBuild is true, then we will hook stderr and fail the build if anything consequential is written there

patch.author: Nicholas Pape <nickpape-msft@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Fix Jest error handling

minor.author: Nicholas Pape <nickpape-msft@users.noreply.github.com>
minor.comment: Upgrade to Node 8

patch.author: Nicholas Pape <nickpape-msft@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Get web-build-tools building with pnpm

patch.author: QZ <qz2017@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Specify package version for chalk. It was used without version specified.

patch.author: Nicholas Pape <nickpape-msft@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Update Jest to ~21.2.1

patch.author: Oleg F <1832418+olfilato@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: reverted addition of rootDir as a parameter for jest task

minor.author: Oleg F <1832418+olfilato@users.noreply.github.com>
minor.comment: Added optional args moduleDirectories and rootDir to JestTask

patch.author: QZ <qz2017@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Add cache configuration to Jest task

patch.author: QZ <qz2017@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Allow settings in jest.json to override Jest task's default options

patch.author: Nick Pape <nickpape-msft@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Automatically use --colors unless --no-colors is specified.

patch.author: QZ <qz2017@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: lock the reference version between web build tools projects

patch.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Upgrade cyclic dependencies

patch.author: Nick Pape <nickpape-msft@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Fix an issue where an exception was being thrown when displaying toasts for build failures.

minor.author: QZ <qz2017@users.noreply.github.com>
minor.comment: Add a Jest task to support running tests on Jest

patch.author: pgonzal <pgonzal@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Updated cyclic dependencies

minor.author: Nick Pape <nickpape@users.noreply.github.com>
minor.comment: Upgrade to es6

patch.author: Nick Pape <nickpape@users.noreply.github.com>
patch.comment: Add $schema field to all schemas

major.comment: Fix compatibility issues with old releases, by incrementing the major version number

minor.comment: added CopyStaticAssetsTask

patch.comment: Update the schema validator.
Allow a partial config to be passed to GulpTask.mergeConfig.
Force a patch bump to ensure everything is published
Add missing orchestrator dependency.

minor.comment: Refactor GulpTask to support taking the name and initial task configuration through the constructor.
Add a --clean or -c command line flag which runs the clean task.

patch.comment: Upgrade @types/semver to 5.3.33
Upgrade to the TS2.4 version of the build tools.
Upgrade to TypeScript 2.4

minor.comment: Add the ability to suppress warnings and errors via a regular expression
Enable StrictNullChecks.

patch.comment: Improve watch() so that it will automatically begin excecuting and it will not exit if there is a failure on the initial build
Add missing API Extractor release tags
Normalizing slashes in warnings suppressions to suppress warnings across windows and 'nix.
Only show overriden errors and warnings when we are in verbose mode.
Fixing an issue with how the GCB schema validator handles errors.

minor.comment: Adding `libES6Folder` setting to build config to optionally instruct tasks to output es6 modules.

patch.comment: Remove ES6 Promise & @types/es6-promise typings
Fixes an issue with the clean command, which causes builds to spuriously fail.
Locking `@types` packages. Synchronizing version specifiers for dependencies with other `web-build-tools` projects.

minor.comment: Add an enabled toggle to IExecutable and GulpTask. Using this toggle is now preferred to overriding the isEnabled function.

patch.comment: Don't watch process exit if user passed in the -h flag.

minor.comment: Remove a function which was exposing z-schema and causing issues.

patch.comment: Ensure the log function is exported
Fix _flatten and make serial/parallel more robust
Update node-notifier to remove SNYK warning about marked package having a vulnerability (although this vulnerability should not affect us)

minor.comment: Remove several logging utilities from the public API and improve documentation in other places.

patch.comment: Update documentation.

minor.comment: Export the SchemaValidator

patch.comment: Enable the schema for CopyTask.
